thread.title: Hugh Grant Is Expecting His Fourth Child in Four Years
thread.title_full: Hugh Grant Is Expecting His Fourth Child in Four Years

author: Sadie Gennis, TV GUIDE
title: Hugh Grant Is Expecting His Fourth Child in Four Years
text:
Hugh Grant | Photo Credits: Corbis Photo: Â© Corbis. All Rights Reserved. Hugh Grant | Photo Credits: Corbis Hugh Grant Is Expecting His Fourth Child in Four Years 1 / 1 
Hugh Grant is expecting his fourth child, Entertainment Tonight reports. 
This will be the second child for Grant and producer Anna Eberstein . They are already parents to son John Mungo , 3. As of last September, Grant told a Swedish newspaper Nojesbladet that he and Eberstein are only "very good friends." 
Over the past four years, Grant has also welcomed daughter Tabitha, 4, and son Felix, 2, with his ex-girlfriend Tinglang Hong . Most Popular
